content: This stream will again be the central channel for the order catalog track at connectathon 25. The order catalog track is described on Confluence here

Order Catalog track appears now in Whova. Go there to reach the Zoom room, which will open at 9am EDT.
@Ana Kostadinovska hope to see you there.
The Zoom room is now open and accessible from Whova.

@Gary Randman We have started the tests. The changes decided last June regarding specimen requirements referenced now by PlanDefinition, are operational. We have also fixed the Bundle transaction-response in case the resource ids are forced by the client.
Next appointment in the room is at 3pm EDT.
We've done our checkpoint with @Gary Randman . Next talk tomorrow morning.

Following our test on the TORCH panel and discussion on reflex tests. The example in the IG specifies how to represent reflex tests with this paragraph:

Reflex tests are represented as sub-actions grouped in a logical group with behavior "any" meaning that any number of members of the group may be performed. Each sub-action is associated with a trigger conveying the named event, which reflexes it.
This sentence needs to be moved to the specification in the LabServiceDefinition profile. I'll make a tracker for this.
@François Macary I just popped in on Zoom. It's pretty quiet. :)
It's on hold for two hours. Reconvene at 3pm as marked in QA and on the Catalog stream. (I need my dinner :-))
The catalog track had its wrapup session and is now closing. See the report on Confluence. Thank you all!
